4V1.F.summary: VGP NV, together with its subsidiaries, develops, owns, and manages logistics and semi-industrial real estate, and ancillary offices. The company leases its properties to tenants in logistic sector, including storing, assembling, re-conditioning, and final treatment of the goods. It also offers asset and property management services; and facility management services, such as maintenance, waste management, greenery maintenance services, etc. The company operates in Germany, Spain, Italy, the Netherlands, Austria, Portugal, the Czech Republic, Slovakia, Hungary, Romania and, Latvia. VGP NV was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Antwerp, Belgium.

ANT.BR.summary: Immo-Antares NV issues real estate certificate under the name Antares. The company issues certificate that gives the right to a quota of the distributions and determined property deals income. Its real estate certificates are mainly offered to investors through a bid and are listed on the Brussels Euronext Regulated Market, as well as through private offers. The company is based in Brussels, Belgium. Immo-Antares NV is a subsidiary of KBC Bank NV.

BAS.BR.summary: Basilix Cert owns and operates a shopping center in Belgium. It operates accessories, food, beauty, jewelry, fashion, multimedia, and house shops, as well as restaurants. The company offers products of approximately 40 brands. Basilix Cert was founded in 1984 and is based in Brussels, Belgium.

BEAB.BR.summary: Immo-Beaulieu NV owns and operates real estate properties. The company is based in Brussels, Belgium. Immo-Beaulieu NV operates as a subsidiary of KBC Bank NV.

DIEG.BR.summary: Immolease Trust NV operates as a subsidiary of KBC Real Estate NV.

DISL.BR.summary: Immobiliere Distri-Land NV issues real estate certificates. The company is based in Brussels, Belgium.

GENK.BR.summary: Genk Logistics owns and manages real estate assets in Genk industrial area. Its assets include offices and warehouses. The company is based in Hoeselt, Belgium.

GROWN.BR.summary: Growners SA, operates in the commercial property sector. The company also engages in the purchase and re-sale of office buildings, and industrial and logistics spaces into units. Its portfolio consists of a range of commercial spaces of surface areas ranging from 50 square meters to 10,000 square meters. The company was formerly known as SV Patrimonia. Growners SA was founded in 2003 and is based in Lasne, Belgium.

IMMOU.BR.summary: Immo Moury SCA is a real estate investment trust. Immo Moury SCA is based in Belgium.

INCLU.BR.summary: Inclusio SA operates as a real estate company in Belgium. It focuses on affordable rental housing, housing for disabled, and social infrastructures. The company is based in Brussels, Belgium.

MCC.BR.summary: Mechelen City Center NV operates as a subsidiary of KBC Bank NV.

MLNEU.BR.summary: Compagnie FinanciÃ¨re de Neufcour S.A. engages in owning and managing commercial and residential real estate properties. The company sells land and houses, as well as rents offices and halls. Compagnie FinanciÃ¨re de Neufcour S.A. was founded in 1995 and is based in FlÃ©ron, Belgium.

SOFT.BR.summary: Softimat S.A. engages in the real estate business. It specializes in office and residential real estate activities. The company leases a property portfolio of office and industrial spaces to various tenants, as well as park consisting of eight buildings, including 13,000 square meters of offices, 2,500 square meters of technical laboratories, and 6,750 square meters of stocks in Belgium and Luxembourg. It also develops residential real estate projects. Softimat S.A. was incorporated in 1981 and is based in Lasne, Belgium.

VGP.BR.summary: VGP NV, together with its subsidiaries, develops, owns, and manages logistics and semi-industrial real estate, and ancillary offices. The company leases its properties to tenants in logistic sector, including storing, assembling, re-conditioning, and final treatment of the goods. It also offers asset and property management services; and facility management services, such as maintenance, waste management, greenery maintenance services, etc. The company operates in Germany, Spain, Italy, the Netherlands, Austria, Portugal, the Czech Republic, Slovakia, Hungary, Romania and, Latvia. VGP NV was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Antwerp, Belgium.

ZEN.BR.summary: Immo-Zenobe Gramme SA engages in the issuance of real estate certificates in Belgium. The company is based in Molenbeek-Saint-Jean, Belgium.
